name: Lepo
description: API documentation for my web application
title: Lepo Documentation

header.title: Lepo API documentation
header.content: Lepo's API provides a set of endpoints for managing users and their data. It includes endpoints for registering and authenticating users, as well as endpoints for creating, updating, retrieving user data. The API uses token-based authentication and all requests must include a valid token in the Authorization header. The API returns data in JSON format and follows the REST architectural style. Endpoints related with admin rights and user's categories, like for example deleteUser endpoint, are not yet fully implemented in the app and that is the reason why those are not added to documentation

footer.title: Contact Information
footer.content: For any questions or support, please contact us at jorganes@tutanota.com.
